name: Biker Switchboard in Wood
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
I joined this site a while ago and decided to make it more appealing visually. Removed footers and most ads. Then decided to add some wood and transparency too. suggestions & comments appreciated...
additional_info:
NOTE: Most member profiles page customizing will not work with this theme. Including yours if you have done any. Your profile will have RED heades for objects you can edit (original site style)

v. .1 (beta) Released
v. .1a minor .css adjustments to text - input area backgrounds and links
v. .1b forms buttons - fixed the ugly blue ones
v. .1c source change of the background image.
v. .1d minor updates to keep up with site changes.
